data.title: Mariangela Sicilia Awards & Recognitions
data.meta_description: Mariangela Sicilia, renowned for her mesmerizing performances, has earned numerous accolades throughout her illustrious career.
data.meta_site_name: Mariangela Sicilia Soprano Official Web Site
data.text:
Awarded for: La Juive at Teatro Regio di Torino

Mariangela Sicilia’s exceptional performance in La Juive was instrumental in the production’s receipt of the Franco Abbiati Prize in 2024, underscoring her remarkable talent and influence in the world of opera.

Awarded for: La Bohème at Teatro Comunale di Bologna

Her stunning portrayal in La Bohème significantly contributed to the production’s accolade, earning the Franco Abbiati Prize in 2019.
